title: Restructuring will gut Triple Crown’s labor force
content:
Triple Crown Services faces job losses as a result of business changes by parent company Nolfolk Southern Corp. 
  
The railroad giant plans to restructure the Fort Wayne-based Triple Crown and downsize about 200 of the company’s approximately 240 jobs, or about 83 percent of its workforce, by the end of 2015, Norfolk Southern said in a statement on Sept. 18.
